content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-9.5, 24.5)
Consists of offshore pump (position -9.5, 24.5), boiler (position not specified), and steam engine (position not specified).

### Copper plate mine at position(x)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when placing electric poles
- Ensure there are no blocking entities at the target location before attempting to place an electric pole. If the area is unplaceable due to terrain (like water), consider relocating the pole.

### Errors when inserting coal into steam engine
- Make sure that the steam engine is nearby and operational before attempting to insert coal. Check for any issues that may prevent the engine from accepting fuel, such as being out of power or having no available slots for fuel.
